how:
Walk or stretch.
This will increase blood flow to your brain
helping you be more productive.

Keep your eyes sharp using
the 20-20-20 rule.
look at something
20 feet away (6 meters)
 for 20 seconds to keep your eyes from straining.

Taking a few snack breaks in between
work will boost your energy levels.

While it's tempting to, checking social
media before getting back to
work can lead to brain overload.
